scripts.build: npm run build:check && npm run build:optimize
scripts.build:check: node -c src/server.js && echo '✅ Syntax check passed'
scripts.build:optimize: npm prune --production && echo '✅ Production dependencies optimized'
scripts.build:full: npm install --production && npm run build:check && echo '✅ Production build complete'
scripts.postinstall: node scripts/setup.js || echo 'Setup script not found, skipping...'
